about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a passionate student interested in software development. I enjoy exploring new technologies and learning through hands-on projects. Currently focused on web development and embedded systems.

projects.title: All Projects
projects.subtitle: Projects I've completed in coursework and personal time

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out through any of the following

project_list.title: Personal Portfolio Website
project_list.description: A personal website built with Astro + TailwindCSS, supporting bilingual (Chinese/English) switching.

project_list.title: Autonomous Racing Car
project_list.description: An autonomous driving project based on the F1tenth platform, implementing path planning and obstacle avoidance.

project_list.title: Hand Gesture Recognition
project_list.description: Real-time hand gesture recognition using MediaPipe, capable of controlling presentation slides.

project_list.title: AI Chatbot
project_list.description: A chatbot powered by LLM API, supporting multi-turn conversations with context memory.

project_list.title: Dance Tutorial Platform
project_list.description: An interactive dance learning application using pose estimation technology.
